mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (userid, userpw, username, email) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE userid = #{userid} AND userpw = #{userpw}
SELECT userid, username, email, regdate FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE userid = #{userid}
SELECT userid, username, email, regdate, role FROM TBL_MEMBER ORDER BY regdate DESC
